resources.string: Please fill in the test! The correct answer gets 1 point, but the wrong answer -0.5 points.
A private connection of LANs and WANs that belongs to an organization, and is designed to be accessible only by the organizations members and employees.
What devices are shown in the picture?
An acronym: end users are able to use their own devices to access the corporate network and resources.
Which type of connection uses a phone line to connect to the internet?
Allows people to deliver their recordings to a wide audience.
Allows people to share files with each other without having to store and download them from a central server.
Web pages that groups of people can edit and view together.
Give anyone a means to communicate their thoughts to a global audience without technical knowledge of web design.
Where people and communities create and share user-generated content with friends.
LAN is a network infrastructure that provides access to users and end devices in a small geographical area.
WAN is similar to a LAN but wirelessly interconnects users and end points in a small geographical area.
SAN is a network infrastructure designed to support file servers and provide data storage.
MAN is a network infrastructure that spans a physical area smaller than a LAN but larger than a WAN.
Redundant connections allow for alternative path if a device or a link fails.
Additional users and whole networks can be connected to the Internet without degrading performance for existing users.
Administrators can protect the network with software and hardware security and by preventing physical access to network devices.
It ensures that priorities are matched with the type of communication and its importance to the organization.
